sentences.en: A radioactive atom could transmute itself into an entirely different kind of atom.
sentences.cn: 放射性原子本身能嬗变为性质完全不同的另一种原子.

sentences.en: Ascension long ago served to transmute karma of the consensus known as Earth so that Earth could retain her vibration.
sentences.cn: 很久之前，提升就为改变地球这个一致实相的业力而服务，好让地球可留在其振动中。

sentences.en: At that time, the CSO was heavily involved in trying to transmute dangerous chemicals via nuclear reactions.
sentences.cn: 当时，中央安全机构正积极参与通过核反应嬗变危险的化学物质。

sentences.en: In ascension, new vibrations are added that dissolve and transmute the old, which are indeed toxic.
sentences.cn: 在提升中, 新振动被加入并融解和超越改变那些的确是有毒的陈旧物.

sentences.en: It is possible to transmute one form of energy into another.
sentences.cn: 把某种形态的能量改变成另一形态的能量是可能的.

sentences.en: Matter Rearrangement. You transmute one metal to another.
sentences.cn: 物质重组: 将一种金属变为另一种.

sentences.en: Medieval alchemists attempted to transmute base metals into gold.
sentences.cn: 中世纪的炼丹术士企图把贱金属炼成金.

sentences.en: One of the supreme quests of alchemy is to transmute lead into gold.
sentences.cn: 炼金术的终极目的之一是将铅转化为金。

sentences.en: Place items here and attempt to combine them with the transmute button.
sentences.cn: 把物品放在这里点击合成按钮合成它们.

sentences.en: She ceased to think, as anger transmuted into passion.
sentences.cn: 随着愤慨变为激怒，她停止了思考。

sentences.en: That luxury appears to be fading as power consumption has skyrocketed and the circuit boards on which the microprocessors sit threaten to transmute themselves into space heaters.
sentences.cn: 但随著耗电量急遽高升，微处理器所在的电路板恐有变身为暖炉的危险，电脑产业既有的优势似乎正渐渐消逝。

sentences.en: These entities, even while occupying a body, could transmute matter.
sentences.cn: 这些实体, 即使在占用身体时, 也能改变物质.

sentences.en: They'll transmute the abundant raw materials into finished products.
sentences.cn: 他们将把丰富的原料变为成品.

sentences.en: We can transmute water power into electric power.
sentences.cn: 我们可以将水力变成电力.

sentences.en: We can transmute water power into electrical power.
sentences.cn: 我们能将水力变成电力.

sentences.en: We can't transmute base metals into gold.
sentences.cn: 我们无法使贱金属变为黄金.

sentences.en: With the right rituals matter could be influenced to transmute into higher forms.
sentences.cn: 借助正确的仪式,事物可以受到影响而转化至更高的形式.

sentences.en: You knew you could transmute it.
You take what was fear, what was darkness, what was void and transmute it into love.
sentences.cn: 你承担起那些恐惧 、 黑暗和空虚,然后把它们转化成爱.

trans.tran_en: to change one substance or type of thing into another
